title: Dr. Deborah Birx, Silent Invasion
description:
Dr. Deborah Birx provides her first-hand account of the Trump Administration's response to the COVID-19 health crisis and discusses preventing the next pandemic. She's interviewed by Georgetown University law professor and Director of the Institute for National and Global Health Law Lawrence Gostin. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
